name: The Californian Smoothie (Avocado-Berry Smoothie)
description: This rich berry-avocado-date smoothie plays homage to the flavors of the Golden State.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup (about 8 ounces) whole milk or unsweetened almond milk, such as Silk brand

recipeInstructions.text: Add avocado, raspberries, strawberries, dates, milk, and honey to the jar of a blender. Turn blender to low and blend until roughly pureed, about 30 seconds. Gradually increase speed to high and blend until smooth, about 1 minute longer. Serve.
